note:
The way of producing and using energy in the next few decades will give direction for all humanity.
One of the biggest emission sources is the housing which is bringing up to 30% of the German CO2 emissions. That's why it's time for sustainable construction techniques, energy efficiency in buildings and cooling and heating by renewable energies.

We must protect the climate much more NOW!!!
